content.description: The following question is based on a performance that you will hear. The excerpt is seven measures long and in simple triple meter. It begins in the tonic key. The first four measures feature piano and harp; the strings become prominent in the last 3 measures.
content.question: The function of the chords in the first two measures is to

unit.text: 5: Harmony and Voice Leading II - Chord Progressions and Predominant Function

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
